title: Google Pay Card Info
description: This object provides information about the selected payment card.

card_details.description: The details about the card. This value is commonly the last four digits of the selected payment account number.

assurance_details.description: This object provides information about the validation performed on the returned payment data if assuranceDetailsRequired is set to true in the CardParameters.

card_network.description: The payment card network of the selected payment. Returned values match the format of allowedCardNetworks in CardParameters.

billing_address.description: The billing address associated with the provided payment method, if billingAddressRequired is set to true in CardParameters.

card_funding_source.description: Card funding source for the selected payment method.
